name: Line Dash
description:
You're dashing on a single line and you have the power to reverse your position on the line. Along the line are dangerous spikes! Use your position reversing power to dodge all the spikes!

▶<CONTROLS>◀
  • Up arrow and down arrow to reverse your position
  • Dodge the spikes!
▶<CREDITS>◀
  • Coding & Art : MilkBomb11
  • Music : Vitality by Elektronomia
▶<Music>◀
  • Song : Elektronomia - Vitality [NCS Release]
  • Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
  • Video Link: https://youtu.be/IS9azbb9hSA
  • Download Link: http://ncs.io/Vitality
